nodes.text: Darion Seville was a woman, who was the matriarch of the Seville pirate clan during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Seville was the mother of Yearo Seville. She liked to arrange duels between her droids, for amusement. The MdZ-BLK participated in a series of these duels, but eventually became so fed up that he attempted to kill Seville. However, Yearo stepped in and ionized the droid, saving his mother.
